I am specialized in the development and application of statistical learning methods (latent variable models, multivariate analysis, sparse methods and regularization) for ecology and life sciences more particularly around omics data and microbial ecology application. 

### Research topics and selected associated publications

-   **Latent variable models in particular for omics data**       [see @aubert2017; @aubert2021hal-03323318; @wang_variational_inference_for_2019_hal-02626026]        
*keywords: Latent Block Models, Overdispersed Count Data, Coupled Hidden Markov-Model*

-   **Applications in microbial ecology**  
plant-microbial communities interactions - soil microbial communities - food microbial communities
[see @lejal_temporal_patterns_in_2021_hal-03287263; @romdhane_unraveling_negative_biotic_2022_hal-03604836; @Thieffry2024-hq; @Lecomte2024-tb; @Zancarini2024-wm]       
*keywords: multivariate analysis, count data, co-occurrences network inference, machine learning, metabarcoding*

-   **Statistical methods for analyzing transcriptomics data**        [see @dillies_a_comprehensive_evaluation_2012_hal-00782486; @mary-huard2008; @magniette_normalization_for_tripletarget_2008_hal-01197566; @chasse_translatome_analysis_at_2018_hal-01803500; @cao_finetuning_of_process_2021_hal-03313075; @aubert_determination_of_the_2004_hal-01208107]              
*keywords: normalization, false discovery rate control, experimental design, sea-urchin traductome, cheese metatranscriptome*

-   **GenexEnvironment prediction**       [see @Washburn2024-qq]       
*keywords: machine learning, reproducibility, competition*
